data.title: Fitzgerald, Ella - Ella Wishes You A Swinging Christmas, Vinyl Record
data.meta_description: Ella Fitzgerald - Ella Wishes You a Swinging Christmas Ruby Red Vinyl The most iconic holiday record in the Verve repertoire, and one of the most successful jazz holiday albums of all time is receiving new life for the 2023 season with a new cover! New first-ever “Ruby Red” color variant with a new Ella-focused collectable cover.
data.text:
New Vinyl Record - Ella Fitzgerald - Ella Wishes You a Swinging Christmas

Ruby Red Vinyl

The most iconic holiday record in the Verve repertoire, and one of the most successful jazz holiday albums of all time is receiving new life for the 2023 season with a new cover! New first-ever “Ruby Red” color variant with a new Ella-focused collectable cover. Ranked #10 on Rolling Stone’s 25 Greatest Christmas Albums of All Time and ranked #2 on The Guardian’s 20 Greatest Holiday Albums Ever. “The best holiday album ever” (Salon). Jingle Bells; Sleigh Ride; Winter Wonderland; and more!
